net.krotscheck.dfr

Interface IDataEncoder

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable, IFilteringDataStream
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    IStreamEncoder, ITextEncoder
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractDataEncoder, AbstractStreamEncoder, AbstractTextEncoder

    public interface IDataEncoder
extends IFilteringDataStream, Closeable
    This interface describes a data encoder, which accepts rows of data and writes them to a specific file format.
    Author:
    Michael Krotscheck

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      String getMimeType()
      Retrieve the mimetype which this encoder supports.
      void write(Map<String,Object> row)
      Writes a row to the underlying data format.

      • Methods inherited from interface net.krotscheck.dfr.IFilteringDataStream

        addFilter, addFilters, applyFilters, clearFilters, containsFilter, getFilters, removeFilter

      • Methods inherited from interface java.io.Closeable

        close

    • Method Detail

      • getMimeType

        String getMimeType()
        Retrieve the mimetype which this encoder supports.
        Returns:
        The mimetype, as a string.

      • write

        void write(Map<String,Object> row)
    throws IOException
        Writes a row to the underlying data format.
        Parameters:
        row - A row of data.
        Throws:
        IOException - Thrown when there's a problem writing to the destination stream.
